author: Justin Wise
title: Nebraska doctors call on governor to enforce more restrictions over coronavirus
description: More than 40 Nebraska doctors are calling on the state's governor, Pete Ricketts (R), to implement stricter social-distancing requirements that "force people to stay at home" amid the outbreak of the novel coronavirus....
content:
More than 40 Nebraska doctors are calling on the state's governor, Pete Ricketts (R), to implement stricter social-distancing requirements that "force people to stay at home" amid the outbreak of the novel coronavirus. 
"COVID-19s arrival has been much swift… [+2327 chars]
